articles.title: Chris Rock could host the Oscars next year teases ABC President - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chris Rock could be hosting next year's Oscars after he was smacked in the face by Best Winning Actor Will Smith. ABC president Craig Erich said that he would consider the comedian for the emcee.
